comment: Uniqueness is equivalent to existence implying unique existence. Alternate definition of the at-most-one quantifier, in terms of the existential quantifier and the unique existential quantifier. (Contributed by NM, 8-Mar-1995.) This used to be the definition of the at-most-one quantifier, while ~ df-mo was then proved as ~ dfmo . (Revised by BJ, 30-Sep-2022.)
